const { Shape, HexagonalGrid } = Gridy

const grid = new HexagonalGrid(70, true, Shape.Rhombus, 4, 4)

const highlight = [
  grid.tile(0, 0),
  grid.tile(3, 0),
  grid.tile(3, 1),
  grid.tile(3, 2),
  grid.tile(3, 3),
  grid.tile(1, 3),
  grid.tile(1, 2),
  grid.tile(1, 1)
]

return { grid, showTiles: true, showCoordinates: true, highlight }
